query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `speech_recognition_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `projectId` int,
  `documentId` int,
  `audioUrl` text,
  `audioFormat` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'webm',
  `audioDuration` int,
  `transcript` text NOT NULL,
  `language` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'zh',
  `recognitionType` enum('file', 'streaming') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'file',
  `confidence` decimal(5, 4),
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `speech_recognition_history_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `projectId` int,
  `documentId` int,
  `audioUrl` text,
  `audioFormat` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'webm',

  `recognitionType` enum('file', 'streaming') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'file',
  `confidence` decimal(5, 4),
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `speech_recognition_history_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
